page.title: 17STRACHAN VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The village hall has recently been improved.There is also a small room for small groups with a carpet and a small snooker table, new toilet facilities and storage space besides the spacious main hall and well equipped kitchen. It is used by the W.R.I. the CHURCH GUILD MOTHER AND CHILD GROUP SYCAMORE CLUB (old folks after trees cut down beside hall) SCHOOL for P.E. and some social events KEEP FIT CLASS in aid of school funds INDOOR BOWLING CLUB YOUTH CLUB COMMUNITY COUNCIL some times and for the occasional club dance or social event e.g. christening. A committee of local people are responsible for fund raising its over all maintenance.
